General.Name: Kingboard Holdings Limited
General.Description: Kingboard Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells laminates and printed circuit boards. It operates through six divisions: Laminates, PCBs, Chemicals, Properties, Investments, and Others. The company also offers chemical products, including methanol, benzene, glacial acetic acid, propylene, methyl tert-butyl ether, liquefied petroleum gas, phenol, acetone, bisphenol A, caustic soda, polyvinyl chloride, hydrochloric acid, liquefied chlorine, chlorinated wax, sodium sulfate, formalin, hydrogen peroxide, and tetrabromobisphenol. In addition, it is involved in the manufacture and distribution of glass fabric, glass yarn, and magnetic products; property investment and development activities; rental and sale of properties; and refining and distribution of chemicals, as well as operates hotel. Its investment property portfolio comprises commercial, residential, and industrial properties. The company sells its products in the People's Republic of China, rest of Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company was formerly known as Kingboard Chemical Holdings Limited and changed its name to Kingboard Holdings Limited in July 2018. Kingboard Holdings Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Sha Tin, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Delta House, Sha Tin, Hong Kong

3.Name: Mr. Yin Sang  Ho
